casebody.data:
Lester Liberman, Individually and as Director and Stockholder of Valley Forge Flag Company, Inc., Respondent, v. Valley Forge Flag Company, Inc., et al., Appellants, et al., Defendant. (Action No. 1.) Lester Liberman, Individually and as Director and Stockholder of Valley Forge Flag Company, Inc., Respondent, v. Valley Forge Flag Company, Inc., et al., Appellants. (Action No. 2.)

(Republished)

Orders, entered on January 16, 1961, unanimously affirmed, with $20 costs and disbursements to the respondent. Concur — Botein, P. J., Rabin, McNally, Stevens and Bergan, JJ.
